CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 4, 1964, pg. 17, reads: "Meanwhile, Backstage - Relaxing in between sets at the first annual Pittsburgh Jazz Festival was co-producer Mary Lou Williams, with the venerable tenor saxophonist Ben Webster, center.  Getting in a few timely words here are the other members of Mary Lou's trio, bassist Larry Gales, at the left, and drummer Percy Brice, right.  (See story and more pictures on page 9) - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Musicians Larry Gales, Ben Webster, Mary Lou Williams, and Percy Brice backstage of Civic Arena for Pittsburgh Jazz Festival
